summary: Alik\'r Hoods, Hammerfell Garb, and Redguard Boots are classified as light armor, provide some damage protection, and are upgradable using leather and linen wraps.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: As requested: Hammerfell Garb and Redguard Boots are now also upgradable and classified light armor. Retex\'s of the hood also provided.

Possibly male only. Only tested with male characters.

Summary:

I thought the Alik\'r Hoods looked great, but I was disappointed they provided no damage protection, so I fixed it. Now they are light armor and upgradable.

----------------------------------------------------------

Changelog:
v1.2 - As requested: Hammerfell Garb and Redguard Boots are now also upgradable and classified light armor. Retex\'s of the hood also provided.
v1.0 - Alik\'r Hoods are classified as light armor and upgradable using leather and linen wraps.

----------------------------------------------------------


Bugs and Incompatible Mods:

Any mods which alter Alik\'r Hoods will probably be incompatible. Could be some other bugs. None discovered. Please report.

----------------------------------------------------------

Installation:

- Put esp in Data folder

Uninstallation:

- Remove esp from Data folder

----------------------------------------------------------

TODO:

- Nothing unless requested

----------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy!

Feedback welcome.

----------------------------------------------------------

THANKS:

Thanks to Dave Humphrey for SkyEdit.

----------------------------------------------------------

Permissions:

Please edit, redistribute, and make derivative works. I would appreciate credit. 

----------------------------------------------------------
My Other Mods
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6745]Hypothermia[/url]
author: Nitor
